num_shards.description: The number of shards to use for the cluster. Valid values are: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6. Defaults to 1.

electable_nodes.description: The number of electable nodes in the cluster. Valid values are: 3, 5, or 7. Defaults to 3.

atlas_region_for_gcp.description: The region in which you want to create the cluster. Valid values for GCP are: EASTERN_US, CENTRAL_US, US_EAST_4, NORTH_AMERICA_NORTHEAST_1, NORTH_AMERICA_NORTHEAST_2, SOUTH_AMERICA_EAST_1, SOUTH_AMERICA_WEST_1, WESTERN_US, US_WEST_2, US_WEST_3, US_WEST_4. Defaults to EASTERN_US.

mongo_db_major_version.description: Version of the cluster to deploy

provider_instance_size_name.description: The instance size to use for your cluster. Valid values are: M10, M20, M30, M40, M50, M60. Defaults to M10.

provider_backup_enabled.description: Whether or not to enable Atlas continuous backups for the new cluster. Defaults to true.
